statements: SELECT * FROM student_performance_data;
SELECT student_id, exam_score, homework_score FROM student_performance_data;
SELECT student_id, exam_score, homework_score, attendance FROM student_performance_data ORDER BY exam_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, exam_score, attendance FROM student_performance_data WHERE exam_score >= 80;
SELECT student_id, homework_score, attendance FROM student_performance_data WHERE homework_score < 70 ORDER BY homework_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_performance_data WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, exam_score FROM student_performance_data WHERE exam_score > 80 ORDER BY exam_score DESC, last_updated ASC;
SELECT student_id, homework_score FROM student_performance_data WHERE attendance >= 90 ORDER BY homework_score ASC, last_updated DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, exam_score, homework_score FROM student_performance_data WHERE exam_score < 70 AND homework_score >= 60 ORDER BY exam_score ASC, homework_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, attendance, last_updated FROM student_performance_data WHERE attendance < 75 ORDER BY attendance ASC, last_updated DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, student_name, birthdate FROM Students ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE course = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE semester = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level, gender, birthdate FROM Students WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY student_name DESC, birthdate ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, course, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 90 AND semester = 1 ORDER BY grade DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level IN (10, 11, 12) AND gender='Male' ORDER BY grade_level ASC, student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(grade) >= 3 ORDER BY average_grade DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, birthdate, course, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id ORDER BY birthdate ASC, grade DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, grade, course_name FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade > 90
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-09-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = grades.course_id WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT student_name, gender, birthdate FROM students WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2005-12-31'
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_level FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = '1234';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_level FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE Students.class_level = 10;

SELECT DISTINCT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id ORDER BY student_name ASC, grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, name, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, department FROM Courses WHERE department='Mathematics';
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM Teachers WHERE department='Science' ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 12 AND teacher_id = 101 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT course_name, department FROM Courses WHERE teacher_id = 201 ORDER BY course_name
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90 AND grade_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM Teachers INNER JOIN Departments ON Teachers.department = Departments.department_name
